GSD.description:
fs/ntfs3: Validate buffer length while parsing index

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v6.0.17 by commit b15374365c9d10445ea7d66cdf885457a0223fc2. For more details please see the references link.
